Come up with your own scenario!

About you:

- You've booked a ride with id `id@ride`
- Today is `Day@schedule` the `Date@plane`, `Time@restaurant`

- Check the status of your ride (id `id@ride`)
- Change something about your booked ride
- RSVP you to a party (Example venues: `PartyName-1@schedule` or `PartyName-2@schedule`)
linear_guide: Use your imagination to generate a conversation about the topics 'checking the status of -- and changing your booked taxi/Uber/Lyft ride' and 'party RSVP' (in any order), as shown on the left. You may also play up to two rounds of trivia with the assistant.
Please have some smalltalk with the AI Assistant at some point in this dialogue.
If it makes sense, use some negations ('I don't want X', or 'anything but Y', etc.)
If you haven't yet, it's time to change topic. You can also go back and forth between topics.

Ok, once you've touched on all the topics ('checking the status of -- and changing your booked taxi/Uber/Lyft ride' and 'party RSVP') and engaged in some smalltalk, you can bring the conversation to a natural close.
